Description.Text: Location The hotel is located in the Golden Beach area, right on the beach. The town centre is around 50 m away, and restaurants, bars, pubs and public transport can be found in the direct vicinity. There is a bus stop roughly 800 m away. The hotel is 25 km from Parikia (the main port), 15 km from Naousa, 1.5 km from Drios (the next village) and 10 km from the airport. Facilities The resort was renovated in 2011. The resort features 41 accommodation units. A lobby and a reception are available to guests. Amenities include a safe. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a dining area, a breakfast room, a caf√© and a bar. The grounds of the resort feature a playground and an attractive garden. Guests arriving in their own vehicles can park in the car park. Among the additional services available are a babysitting service, medical assistance, room service, a laundry and a hairdressing salon. Active guests can make use of the bicycle hire service to explore the surrounding area. Rooms Special family rooms are available for families with children. All rooms feature air conditioning, central heating, a fan, a living room and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace is also included as standard. Many of the rooms also offer a sea view, adding to the ambience. Each accommodation unit features separate bedrooms, a double bed or a king-size bed. Cots are available for children. Among the amenities are a safe and a desk. All accommodation units have a kitchenette with a fridge, a mini-fridge and tea and coffee making equipment. Internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio, a stereo system, a DVD player, an alarm clock and wireless internet access are provided as standard. In each of the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub, a spa bath, a hairdryer and bathrobes. Sports/Entertainment The resort offers an outdoor pool and a children's pool. A terrace, sun loungers and parasols are available. The hot tub offers revitalisation. There is also a poolside snack bar. For those wishing to enjoy some exercise, tennis, beach volleyball and horse riding are offered onsite. With windsurfing, a banana boat, canoeing, sailing and diving, fans of watersports will have plenty to choose from. A gym and table tennis are some of the sports and leisure options available at the resort. Various wellness options are offered, including a spa, a steam bath, a hammam, a beauty salon, massage treatments and thalassotherapy. Further available options include a kids' club. Meals Various meals and board options are bookable. Guests can choose from breakfast, lunch, dinner, B & B, half board and full board. Special meals, including vegetarian dishes, are available. Special deals can be enjoyed at the resort. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the resort: VISA and MasterCard.

The hotel is located in the Golden Beach area, right on the beach. The town centre is around 50 m away, and restaurants, bars, pubs and public transport can be found in the direct vicinity. There is a bus stop roughly 800 m away. The hotel is 25 km from Parikia (the main port), 15 km from Naousa, 1.5 km from Drios (the next village) and 10 km from the airport.

Special family rooms are available for families with children. All rooms feature air conditioning, central heating, a fan, a living room and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace is also included as standard. Many of the rooms also offer a sea view, adding to the ambience. Each accommodation unit features separate bedrooms, a double bed or a king-size bed. Cots are available for children. Among the amenities are a safe and a desk. All accommodation units have a kitchenette with a fridge, a mini-fridge and tea and coffee making equipment. Internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio, a stereo system, a DVD player, an alarm clock and wireless internet access are provided as standard. In each of the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub, a spa bath, a hairdryer and bathrobes.

The resort was renovated in 2011. The resort features 41 accommodation units. A lobby and a reception are available to guests. Amenities include a safe. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a dining area, a breakfast room, a caf√© and a bar. The grounds of the resort feature a playground and an attractive garden. Guests arriving in their own vehicles can park in the car park. Among the additional services available are a babysitting service, medical assistance, room service, a laundry and a hairdressing salon. Active guests can make use of the bicycle hire service to explore the surrounding area.

The resort offers an outdoor pool and a children's pool. A terrace, sun loungers and parasols are available. The hot tub offers revitalisation. There is also a poolside snack bar. For those wishing to enjoy some exercise, tennis, beach volleyball and horse riding are offered onsite. With windsurfing, a banana boat, canoeing, sailing and diving, fans of watersports will have plenty to choose from. A gym and table tennis are some of the sports and leisure options available at the resort. Various wellness options are offered, including a spa, a steam bath, a hammam, a beauty salon, massage treatments and thalassotherapy. Further available options include a kids' club.

Various meals and board options are bookable. Guests can choose from breakfast, lunch, dinner, B & B, half board and full board. Special meals, including vegetarian dishes, are available. Special deals can be enjoyed at the resort.

The following credit cards are accepted at the resort: VISA and MasterCard.
*Please note all early departures will be assessed room/tax for their entire stay *Registry Number MH.T.E - 1175K034A0158400
